body: Hi everyone i want to make a team for tournament and such and i was wondering how to do so. Are there any qualifications or pre requites. Any and all information would be great thank you. -Piano
body_tagged: Hi everyone i want to make a team for tournament and such and i was wondering how to do so. Are there any qualifications or pre requites. Any and all information would be great thank you. -Piano
title: creating a new team

replies.body:
Go to Competitive, click it and go to teams. There you can create a team 
To register for a tournament, usually you need to have a certain number of players, other than that nothing much
replies.body_tagged:
Go to Competitive, click it and go to teams. There you can create a team 
To register for a tournament, usually you need to have a certain number of players, other than that nothing much

replies.body:
You may try, but it won't grow. There is no enough ppl to participate :(
There are some new small teams, so i suggest you to play for one before creating your own.
